com.example.marker.markerDetection

Class MarkerDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.marker.markerDetection.MarkerDetector

  • public class MarkerDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Marker Detection class, handles all the detection logic.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.opencv.core.Mat cameraMatrix 
      private java.util.List<org.opencv.core.Mat> corners
      The list of corners of the detected markers.
      private java.util.List<MarkerData> detectedMarkers
      A list of detected markers data.
      private org.opencv.core.Mat distortionCoef 
      private org.opencv.core.Mat ids
      The ids of the detected markers.
      private org.opencv.aruco.Dictionary markerDictionary
      Dictionary that contains the markers to be scanned for and detected.
      private float markerLength
      Length of the marker to be detected.
      private org.opencv.core.Mat rvecs
      The rvecs and tvecs of the detected markers.
      private static java.lang.String TAG 
      private org.opencv.core.Mat tvecs
      The rvecs and tvecs of the detected markers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MarkerDetector()
      This constructor defines all member variables, defines cameraMatrix as a 3x3 CV_64FC1 Matrix as well as the distortionCoef as a 5x1 CV_64FC1 Matrix.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int detectedMarkersSize() 
      org.opencv.core.Mat drawAxis(org.opencv.core.Mat frameRGBA)
      This method draws x, y and z axis on top of each marker and calls drawDetectedMarkers method.
      org.opencv.core.Mat drawDetectedMarkers(org.opencv.core.Mat frameRGBA)
      This method draws a square around the detected markers and writes the id on top of each marker.
      java.util.List<MarkerData> getDetectedMarkers() 
      void markerDetection(org.opencv.core.Mat frameGray)
      This method takes a gray frame, detects the markers and stores their corners, rvecs, tvecs and ids, then updates the detectedMarkers list with the new markers detected.
      private void updateDetectedMarkers(java.util.List<MarkerData> detectedMarkers)
      This method updates the detectedMarkers list with the new markers detected.
